task.instruction: You are Kenji Tanaka (email: kenji.tanaka@company.com). Restructure the 'TechFlow Space' created by user 22 by setting 'Getting Started Guide - Part 184' as the root document. If it has no versions, create a new major version using content from the template 'Performance Report Template 17', with the comment 'Finalized with official performance template' and title 'Official Performance Review Minutes'. After this new version is created, add a section at the bottom of the guide: 'For performance reviews, please see the Official Performance Review Minutes.'. If the guide has no child pages, make 'Meeting Minutes - Part 306' its child and remove the 'draft' label from the 'Meeting Minutes - Part 306' page. Rename the guide's attachment to 'guide_diagram_v2.jpg'.

output.description: Human resources documentation including policies, procedures, employee handbooks, and training materials.
output.name: TechFlow Space

output.content:
# Getting Started Guide - Part 184

Welcome to our comprehensive getting started guide.

## Overview

This section covers overview related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper overview implementation.

## Quick Start

This section covers quick start related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper quick start implementation.

## Navigation

This section covers navigation related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper navigation implementation.

## Best Practices

This section covers best practices related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper best practices implementation.

## Getting Help

This section covers getting help related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper getting help implementation.

## Additional Resources

- Related documentation links
- Support contact information
- Training materials
output.excerpt: Welcome to our comprehensive getting started guide.
output.title: Getting Started Guide - Part 184

output.content:
= Performance Analysis Report =

== Executive Summary ==
Brief overview of performance analysis findings and key recommendations.

== Report Period ==
* '''Start Date:''' [Date]
* '''End Date:''' [Date]
* '''Reporting Frequency:''' [Weekly/Monthly/Quarterly]

== Key Performance Metrics ==

=== System Performance ===
* '''Average Response Time:''' [X]ms (Target: [Y]ms)
* '''Peak Response Time:''' [X]ms
* '''System Uptime:''' [X]% (Target: 99.9%)
* '''Error Rate:''' [X]% (Target: <0.1%)

=== User Experience Metrics ===
* '''Page Load Time:''' [X]s (Target: <3s)
* '''User Session Duration:''' [X] minutes
* '''Bounce Rate:''' [X]%
* '''User Satisfaction Score:''' [X]/10

=== Infrastructure Metrics ===
* '''CPU Utilization:''' Average [X]%, Peak [Y]%
* '''Memory Usage:''' Average [X]%, Peak [Y]%
* '''Disk I/O:''' [X] IOPS
* '''Network Throughput:''' [X] Mbps

== Performance Trends ==

=== Positive Trends ===
* [Improvement 1]: [Description and impact]
* [Improvement 2]: [Description and impact]

=== Areas of Concern ===
* [Issue 1]: [Description and impact]
* [Issue 2]: [Description and impact]

== Root Cause Analysis ==

=== Issue 1: [Issue Name] ===
* '''Symptoms:''' [Description]
* '''Root Cause:''' [Analysis]
* '''Impact:''' [Business impact]
* '''Timeline:''' [When issue occurred]

=== Issue 2: [Issue Name] ===
* '''Symptoms:''' [Description]
* '''Root Cause:''' [Analysis]
* '''Impact:''' [Business impact]
* '''Timeline:''' [When issue occurred]

== Recommendations ==

=== Short-term Actions (1-4 weeks) ===
# [Recommendation 1]: [Description and expected benefit]
# [Recommendation 2]: [Description and expected benefit]
# [Recommendation 3]: [Description and expected benefit]

=== Medium-term Actions (1-3 months) ===
# [Recommendation 1]: [Description and expected benefit]
# [Recommendation 2]: [Description and expected benefit]

=== Long-term Actions (3+ months) ===
# [Recommendation 1]: [Description and expected benefit]
# [Recommendation 2]: [Description and expected benefit]

== Action Plan ==

{| class="wikitable"
! Action Item !! Priority !! Owner !! Target Date !! Status !! Notes
|-
| [Action 1] || High/Medium/Low || [Name] || [Date] || Not Started/In Progress/Complete || [Notes]
|-
| [Action 2] || High/Medium/Low || [Name] || [Date] || Not Started/In Progress/Complete || [Notes]
|}

== Next Review ==
* '''Date:''' [Date]
* '''Focus Areas:''' [Areas to monitor]

== Report Prepared By ==
* '''Analyst:''' [Name]
* '''Date:''' [Date]
* '''Approved By:''' [Manager Name]
output.description: Performance analysis report template with metrics, trends, recommendations, and action plans for system optimization.
output.name: Performance Report Template 17
